Name: Add-VpnConnection
Synopsis: Adds a VPN connection to the Connection Manager phone book.

Name: Add-VpnConnectionRoute
Synopsis: Adds a route to a VPN connection.

Name: Add-VpnConnectionTriggerApplication
Synopsis: Adds applications that automatically trigger a VPN connection when launched.

Name: Add-VpnConnectionTriggerDnsConfiguration
Synopsis: Adds a DNS suffix or name to VPN connection trigger properties.

Name: Add-VpnConnectionTriggerTrustedNetwork
Synopsis: Adds DNS suffixes as trusted networks to the VPN profile.

Name: Get-VpnConnection
Synopsis: Retrieves the specified VPN connection profile information.

Name: Get-VpnConnectionTrigger
Synopsis: Gets trigger properties of a VPN connection.

Name: New-EapConfiguration
Synopsis: Generates an XML file with the specified EAP configuration.

Name: New-VpnServerAddress
Synopsis: Creates a VPN server address object.

Name: Remove-VpnConnectionRoute
Synopsis: Removes a route from a VPN connection.

Name: Remove-VpnConnectionTriggerApplication
Synopsis: Removes a trigger application from a VPN connection object.

Name: Remove-VpnConnectionTriggerDnsConfiguration
Synopsis: Removes DNS suffixes from VPN connection DNS trigger properties.

Name: Remove-VpnConnectionTriggerTrustedNetwork
Synopsis: Removes DNS suffixes previously configured as trusted networks from the VPN profile.

Name: Set-VpnConnection
Synopsis: Changes the configuration settings of an existing VPN connection profile.

Name: Set-VpnConnectionIPsecConfiguration
Synopsis: Sets the IPsec parameters of a VPN connection.

Name: Set-VpnConnectionProxy
Synopsis: Configures web proxy information for the specified VPN connection.

Name: Set-VpnConnectionTriggerDnsConfiguration
Synopsis: Changes DNS servers for an existing DNS suffix.
